meta.name: description
meta.content: ObjectLab Kit offers free and open source Date calculators, released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Date calculator, IMM Dates, Period Calculator, Financial Calendar, Business Calendar, java, open source

section.name: Utils Introduction
section.p: The Utils package provides classes for BigDecimal, Boolean, Collection, etc mainly dealing with the possibility of Null!.
It also provides Total, Average and WeightedAverage that handle BigDecimals (including nulls) for you.
